title: Blackcurrant teabread
ingredients: ['340 g (12 oz) self-raising flour', '1 tsp baking powder', '50 g (1¾ oz) unsalted butter, cut into small pieces', '100 g (3½ oz) light muscovado sugar', '150 g (5½ oz) fresh blackcurrants', '3 tbsp chopped fresh mint', '150 ml (5 fl oz) orange juice, or as needed']
